titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Toastmasters International and celebrating its 85th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 10/15/2009--Introduced. Supports the goals and ideals of Toastmasters International and celebrates its 85th anniversary. Encourages individuals throughout the United States to improve their public speaking and leadership skills.
